responses: Hello!
Good to see you!

I was created by Seow Hui Chee.
You can call me TAR UMT query chatbot. I'm a Chatbot.

patterns: How can I communicate with the university?
What are the communication channels for students and parents?
responses: You can communicate with the university through our official email (info@tarc.edu.my), tel (6)03-41450123, or by visiting the respective department.
I'm here to assist you with any questions or information you need. How can I assist you today?
Good morning! How can I assist you today?
Good afternoon! How can I assist you today?
Good evening! How can I assist you today?
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
No problem! If there's anything else you need assistance with, feel free to let me know.

patterns: What are the university working timings?
What are the hours of operation?
responses: The university is open from 8.30 am to 5.30 pm for Monday to Friday. Close for Saturday and Sunday.

patterns: How can I contact the university?
What is the university phone number
What is the university telephone number?
Can I get your contact number?
responses: You can contact the university at (6)03-41450123.

patterns: How can I reach the college?
responses: The university is located at Jalan Genting Kelang, Setapak, 53300 Kuala Lumpur. You can find the location on Google Maps (https://maps.app.goo.gl/zoRdL5jF3vneKs3S6).

patterns: Does the college provide hostel facilities?
responses:
The university provide hostel accomodation (location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/ezCAwd35tNnJTBuU8), consists of 10 blocks of 5-storey building with 1,000 standard rooms which can accommodate 2,000 students. Each room is on a twin-sharing basis with 400 rooms allocated for male and 600 rooms for female in separate blocks. Each floor has its own common bathrooms, toilets, pantry, water dispenser and drying area. Hostel availability is based on first-come-first-served basis. 
 Rental fees : RM 243.00 per person per month and is paid on a semester basis. It provide lots facility. For detailed information about the hostel, please visit our college website (https://www.tarc.edu.my/dsa/a/accommodation/accommodation-kl-main-campus/).

patterns: What events are organized in the college?
Tell me about the college events.
responses: There are many event held at Yum Yum Cafeteria (https://maps.app.goo.gl/9qTMrSzNWaCWeAYG6) and The Rimba (https://maps.app.goo.gl/xCYqiUkDA29czSaYA).

patterns: Does the university have a library?
responses: The library is located at https://maps.app.goo.gl/FXLd4RwD7z2PYeNM6. The timings are from 8:30 am to 9:00 pm from Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 2:00 pm on Saturday, and it is closed on Sunday. <iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m8!1m3!1d704.1954516290003!2d101.72769535627513!3d3.2170536235931806!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x31cc3869b40fb3bb%3A0x69267c00497dfef5!2sTAR%20UMT%20Library!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1719762758660!5m2!1sen!2sus" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

patterns: What facilities are available in the university?
Tell me about the university facilities.
Do you have a sports complex?
responses: The university provides various facilities including a sports complex (https://maps.app.goo.gl/E8Rm3WKkG39xdCyz7), 2 gym located at sport complex or club house(https://maps.app.goo.gl/nsVTKShzD9X8SX628), cafeteria, library and so on.

patterns: Are the class sizes large or small?
Do you have small class sizes?
responses: Class sizes can vary depending on the course and program. As general, tutorial and practical is small class learning ; lecture is big class learning which may consist of multiple programme join together.

patterns: What food provided at the canteen or cafeteria
How much is the price for food.
responses: 1. There are The Red Bricks Cafeteria (Block G, West Campus) [7.30am-5.00pm (Mon-Fri),8.00am-4.00pm (Sat)] :https://maps.app.goo.gl/DGRZHbtfxzLDcuR7A. 2. Yum Yum Cafeteria (Block L, West Campus) [7.30am-5.00pm (Mon-Fri), 8.00am-4.00pm (Sat)] : https://maps.app.goo.gl/g4rRsv3ZA1LHyE3D8. 3. Fort Margherita Cafe (Cyber Centre, West Campus) [7.30am-6.00pm (Mon-Fri),8.00am-4.00pm (Sat)]: https://maps.app.goo.gl/syXd2oSUR5N4o9bD8. 4. Casuarina Cafe (Block SC, East Campus) [7.30am-5.00pm (Mon-Fri),8.00am-3.00pm (Sat)] :https://maps.app.goo.gl/kDKfr2Qw966qwEYp6. 5.Lily's Cafe (Block SC, East Campus) [8.00am-6.00pm (Mon-Fri), 8.00am-3.00pm (Sat)]:https://maps.app.goo.gl/kDKfr2Qw966qwEYp6. 6.Heritage Kitchen (ClubHouse, West Campus) [7.30am-7.00pm (Mon-Fri), 8.00am-4.00pm (Sat)]: https://maps.app.goo.gl/RsAeeBmejiDs1Kmc7. 7.Sunnydae (Library Cafe, West Campus) [8.00am-7.00pm (Mon-Fri), 8.00am-4.00pm (Sat)]: https://maps.app.goo.gl/Mm2KEetfgs1m4yx56. Various kinds of food are provided at these canteens. The food prices at the Canteen/ Cafeteria on Campus are always cheaper and affordable if compared with the private food outlets outside the campus to ensure that students will remain consumed inside the campus rather than go to take the meals outside the campus. For more information: https://www.tarc.edu.my/dsa/food-and-beverage/

patterns: I can't find past year paper!
responses: You can find past year paper at eprints: https://eprints.tarc.edu.my/

You can find parking lots beside sport complex (https://maps.app.goo.gl/8kKJvh3CZnXxKrjD7), beside club house(https://maps.app.goo.gl/Hv9ZSiYEHcht5vr8A) at west campus ; behind DK ABF (https://maps.app.goo.gl/Zyh4fu2yPnLWCBRPA), east campus parking(https://maps.app.goo.gl/SKCmWDkYa7qmFZ3c7)

patterns: Can I simply parking without any car pass?
How to get vehicle entry pass?
responses: You need to apply the Vehicle Entry Pass by logging into TARUC Student Intranet (https://web.tarc.edu.my/portal/login.jsp)

patterns: How to go to student Intranet
responses: You can find announcement, timetable, billing, examination details and so on at TARUC Student Intranet (https://web.tarc.edu.my/portal/login.jsp)

patterns: I am sick, what should I do
responses: You can apply attendance leave at TARUC Student Intranet (https://web.tarc.edu.my/portal/login.jsp)
You can apply for financial aid or scholarship at TARUC Student Intranet (https://web.tarc.edu.my/portal/login.jsp), For more information: https://www.tarc.edu.my/dsa/financial-aid/financial-aid/

TAR UMT has a fleet of air-conditioned buses to ferry students between the Kuala Lumpur Main Campus and the following nearby residential areas: 1 Wangsa Maju, 2 Teratai Residency/PV18, 3 Genting Kelang /PV18, 4. Melati Utama, 5 PV10, PV12, PV13, PV15, PV16 ;
Tutorial class is a small class with group mate, doing and discuss questions with tutor.
Practical class is a small class with group mate, doing lab exercise or assignment using personal laptop or computer in computer lab with tutor.
Lecture class is a big class with different programme that taking the same course, listen the lesson taught by lecturer.
